Package com.flipkart.DAO

Interface CustomerInterfaceDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerDAO
    public interface CustomerInterfaceDAO
    This interface defines the data access operations related to customer functionality. It includes methods for customer registration, validating user credentials, and retrieving customer details by user ID.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Customer getCustomerById​(java.lang.String userName)
      Retrieves customer details based on the provided username.
      boolean isUserValid​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password)
      Validates the user's credentials (username and password).
      void registerCustomer​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String phoneNumber, java.lang.String cardNumber)
      Registers a new customer with the provided details.

    • Method Detail

      • registerCustomer

        void registerCustomer​(java.lang.String userName,
                      java.lang.String password,
                      java.lang.String email,
                      java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                      java.lang.String cardNumber)
               throws RegistrationFailedException
        Registers a new customer with the provided details.
        Parameters:
        userName - The username chosen by the customer
        password - The password chosen by the customer
        email - The email address of the customer
        phoneNumber - The phone number of the customer
        cardNumber - The card number associated with the customer
        Throws:
        RegistrationFailedException - If the registration process fails

      • isUserValid

        boolean isUserValid​(java.lang.String userName,
                    java.lang.String password)
             throws UserInvalidException
        Validates the user's credentials (username and password).
        Parameters:
        userName - The username entered by the user
        password - The password entered by the user
        Returns:
        True if the user is valid, false otherwise
        Throws:
        UserInvalidException - If the user is not valid

      • getCustomerById

        Customer getCustomerById​(java.lang.String userName)
        Retrieves customer details based on the provided username.
        Parameters:
        userName - The username of the customer
        Returns:
        Customer object representing the customer details
